name: A Door to the Past
description:
Control

  • Use Arrow Keys (Left and Right) and space button to control the player.
  • Use Arrow Keys or mouse while picking the lock (Recommend to use mouse to drag the lock when available.)

Story

After coming home on weekend Billy found out that he lost his keys to house. So, he start lockpicking to the doors of his house. But something unexpected was waiting for him behind the doors of his own house.
